Description: Define the project vision and objectives
Create and prioritize the product backlog
Select items from the product backlog for the sprint
Short daily meeting to sync progress and plan next steps
Develop the selected backlog items
Review the increment with stakeholders
Reflect on the sprint and identify improvements
Define criteria for completed work
Automatically integrate code changes
Automatically prepare code for release
Automatically deploy code to production
Plan and coordinate the release of the software
Execute the release plan and deploy the software
Review the release process and outcomes
Regularly review and refine the product backlog
Conduct testing to ensure the software meets user needs
Conduct performance testing to ensure the software meets performance criteria
Conduct security testing to ensure the software is secure
Create and maintain project documentation
Regularly communicate with stakeholders
